userInterface module¶

Created on Sat May 2 13:57:35 2020

@author: Pontus Nordqvist @email: p.nordq@gmail.com

class userInterface.MainWindow(app)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

MainWindow-class to hande GUI. It inherits from the QMainWindow class.

initModel()[source]¶

Method to initiate the model with default parameters given from the plantmodel class. It also defaults visualisation, filename, buttons, solver and booleans for the calculation done and fatal error found.

None.

onActionExecute()[source]¶

Method to start an execution thread to call an solver on the input.

None.

onActionExit()[source]¶

Method that is triggered when the user clicks on the exit button in the program (not the x in the window). Also, it closes all figure windows. Note: It might not terminate the kernel.

None.

onActionNew()[source]¶

Method to initiate a new model. The new model will have the default values.

None.

onActionOpen()[source]¶

Method to opean an input JSON file.

None.

onActionSave()[source]¶

Method to save the modell. Before it saves the model, it updates it with the given inpute i.e no prior execution is needed. It also checks for if there are any fatal errors and does not save if that is the case. It uses popups to communicate with the user.

None.

onActionSaveAs()[source]¶

Method to save the model as an new file. Before it saves the model, it updates it with the given input i.e no prior execution is needed. It also checks for if there are any fatal errors and does not save if that is the case. It uses popups to communicate with the user.

None.

onEltype2()[source]¶

Method to change the element type to 2 (triangles). It is triggered by the corresponding radio button.

None.

onEltype3()[source]¶

Method to change the element type to 3 (quads). It is triggered by the corresponding radio button.

None.

onExecuteParamStudy()[source]¶

Method to that runs a paramter study using a solver thread. The input is taken from the GUI. Further, it also handles some invalid inputs.

None.

onShowDisplacement()[source]¶

Method that shows the calculated displacment in the plantmodel class. It is triggered when the displacement button in the GUI is pressed.

None.

onShowElementValues()[source]¶

Method that shows the calculated effective stress for the elements in the plantmodel class. It is triggered when the displacement button in the GUI is pressed.

None.

onShowElsize()[source]¶

Method to get the given value from the element size slider to the inputdata. Also, it updates the box showing the given value.

None.

onShowGeometry()[source]¶

Method that shows the geometry in the plantmodel class. It is triggered when the geomtery button in the GUI is pressed.

None.

onShowMesh()[source]¶

Method that shows the mesh in the plantmodel class. It is triggered when the mesh button in the GUI is pressed.

None.

onShowUndisplacedMesh()[source]¶

Method to show/unshow the undisplaced mesh in the displacement figure.

None.

onSolverFinished()[source]¶

Method to start when an execution thread has enden. Also print the report.

None.

updateButtons()[source]¶

Method to update the button and the ticbox to be visable after an calulation is done.

None.

updateControls()[source]¶

Method to update the GUI with the values from the plantmodel class.

None.

updateModel()[source]¶

Method to update the model given and input in the GUI. If an invalid input is given, an critical messagebox stating the error is triggered.

None.

class userInterface.SolverThread(solver, paramStudy=False)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtCore.QThread

Class to handle execution threads i.e solverthreads.

run()[source]¶

Method to start the thread. The thread does an solver.execute() and a solver.executeParamStudy() if told to in the constructor.

None.
